text: The Children of Prophet Muhammad include three sons and four daughters. All were born to Muhammad's first wife Khadija bint Khuwaylid except one son, who was born to Maria al-Qibtiyya. ==List of children == Muhammad's children were: *Qasim ibn Muhammad, (598 – 600 or 601 CE) *Zainab bint Muhammad, (599 – 630 CE) *Ruqayyah bint Muhammad, (601 – 624 CE) *Umme Kulthum bint Muhammad, (603 – 630 CE) *Abd-Allah ibn Muhammad, also known as Tahir and Tayyab, (d. 615 CE) *Fatimah bint Muhammad, (ca. 604 – 632 CE) *Ibrahim ibn Muhammad, (630 – 631 CE) == References == Category:Children of Muhammad
title: Children of Muhammad
